main event: A UFO sighting involving three lights observed over North Platte, Nebraska on 22 Mar 60.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 5-6 minutes and involved three erratic moving lights., The lights appeared brighter than surrounding stars or ground lights., The conclusion was drawn that the lights could be attributed to work lights from nearby machinery or a mirage effect., Weather conditions were reported to be good during the observation., The event involved multiple military pilots who provided a reliable account.
sighted object: three lights brighter than surrounding stars
